Safe & Durable Material & Unbreakable Zipper – Our pet travel bag is made of eco-friendly and durable oxford fabric. It is sturdy and durable, has good load-bearing capacity, prevents dogs from scratching, and has no unpleasant toxic chemical smell. The zipper of the dog bag is a two-way zipper made of metal, which is dog bags for traveling very smooth to pull and will not break or bend, much less break or derail during.
Take A Dog Weekend Bag On A Plane Trip – This dog bag is airline approved and conforming to carry-on dog travel bags, this dog food travel bag has a roller bag cover that fits over the handle of a suitcase. Road trips, dog camping trips, beach trips, hiking trips are so easy to add to your dog travel accessories and dog camping gear.
Multifunctional Travel Dog Bag-Come with 1 Dog Organizer bag, 2 Fully insulated food containers, 2 Collapsible dog bowls allows dogs to eat easily on the go. The pet travel bag can be easily hung in the car with an adjustable shoulder strap, and traveling with this bag will ensure your pet is comfortable wherever you are.
30 Days Worry-free Purchase – Our dog travel bags come with an absolute satisfaction guarantee. If you have any problems with your dog bag, just send us a message and we’ll be sure to fix the problem. Buying our bags is absolute risk free!

Every time I travel, I worry that I can’t give the dog the same feeling as at home. Therefore, it’s a wise choice to carry a dog travel bag. Our dog bag has enough storage space to store all your dog’s food, snacks and toys. It is a large capacity dog storage bag with multiple zipper pockets, detachable partition, thickened lining, inner mesh storage bag, stool bag distributor pocket, etc. it is a perfect way to make your pet feel at home.

Poop Bag Dispenser Pocket

Avoid sudden embarrassment

Detachable Shoulder Strap

Freely switch between two travel modes of portable diagonal straddle

Convenient for You to Travel

The luggage rod can be hung on the design for convenient transportation

Multi-functional Dog Travel Bag

This multi-functional dog travel bag is made of high-density Oxford fabric. It’s light and durable. It’s a necessary good thing for you to take your pet to travel. It’s also perfect for storage at home. One bag can meet the travel needs of all your dogs.

Read more

Travel Essentials

Our bags come with all the accessories needed for up to a week getaway! This includes 2x silicone collapsible food and water bowls and 2x lined food containers. Our food containers are insulated to make it water resistance and can keep your dog food fresh! Each food carrier can hold up to 13 cups of food or treats for a total of 26 cups!

1X DOG TRAVEL BAG

2X LINED FOOD/TREAT CONTAINERS

2X SILICONE COLLAPSIBLE FOOD/WATER BOWLS

Our dog seatbelts are long enough for your dog to move around comfortably and still keep them from jumping into the front seat or falling out of the window. Choose suitable dog seat belts for medium dogs, small, or large – perfect for any breed – a dog seatbelt tether that lasts!
ADJUSTABLE FOR A UNIVERSAL FIT – If you‚Äôre looking for a dog belt for dogs for car rides, then this dog seat belt harness will fit perfectly for any dog size, whether you need dog seat belts for small dogs, medium, large, or even x-large! Adjust quickly and easily between 21‚Äù and 31‚Äù with the durable dog seat belt tether. This is why our harnesses are some of the top seat belts for dogs in cars! PREMIUM MATERIALS FOR ENHANCED DURABILITY – Protect your furry friend from sudden stops or sharp turns with our seatbelt leash for dogs! From the brand

Rookie Driver Car Magnets

Student Driver Car Magnet

We are committed to researching magnetic student driving signs, decals and stickers. Our mission is to ensure that every driver has a more enjoyable and comfortable driving experience, to allow other drivers to tolerate you with more space and respect, to reduce the nervousness of new drivers while preventing the possibility of accidents.

Christmas Gifts

A great gift for your family, friends, colleagues and neighbours in the run up to Christmas!

‚ûΩSTRONGEST MAGNETS: The student driver car magnet is made of 0.7mm thick strong magnet. Compared with other magnets, it is thicker, stronger, more durable and be patient student driver magnet can be more firmly attached to the surface of the car, we have tested for a long time at high speed, heavy rain and snow and never fall off. Tip: Magnets can only be attached to metal surfaces, not to plastic or aluminum parts.
‚ûΩHIGHLY REFLECTIVITY: New driver magnet for car is made of high quality waterproof and heat resistant materials through strong magnetic and highly reflective materials to maximize the amount of light reflected from the sign, attracting people’s attention and ensuring that the rookie driver car magnet is clearly visible even at night, in fog and rain, and other drivers can notice you from the side and back of the car. An excellent tool for teens with no driving experience.
‚ûΩUnique design: New driver sticker signs will be displayed humorously and can make others aware that you are learning to drive, then they will be tolerant of providing you with more space and respect and reduce the possibility of annoying honking while controlling the speed of their car to prevent an accident. Student driver magnet also can reduce the level of nervousness teen driver feel when driving.
‚ûΩRemovable and Reusable: Student driver signs for car removable, easily removable or transferable thanks to the magnetized backing. All driver magnets can be removed and reattached anytime. You can easily transfer it to another car when it is needed. Perfect as a gift for your family, colleagues, friends during various holidays, parties, birthdays
‚ûΩ100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We are dedicated to providing the best quality new driver sticker for car to our customers. If you are in any way dissatisfied with our please be patient student driver magnet, please contact us and we will do our best to provide you a satisfactory reply.

From the brand

About DEWENWILS

DEWENWILS has maintained scientific rigor to create pragmatic and design-aesthetic products of great value. Specializing in Tools and Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment,our products range from Timer Series, Outlet Switches and Light Sockets to Extension Wire and Lamps. Since 2016, our products boom globally, bringing intelligent convenience and new energy infusion to your life

Outdoor Timer

Remote Control Outlet

Low Voltage Transformer

Extension cord reel

BRAND VISION

Back to the essence of your home life-simplicity, safety and comfort

WHAT MAKES DEWENWILS UNIQUE

Attach great caution with the whole productionÔøöeach product has undergone the product development of a full range of ideas, technical parameters adjustment, strict quality control, and revision based on customer feedback.

WE LOVE WHAT WE DO

Enthusiasm and innovation are our eternal driving force.Simplifying home lives and branding growth are our motivation.Sincere feedback and the love of consumers are reasons for persistence.

„ÄêWEATHER-RESISTANT CONNECTION„Äë This waterproof extension cord connector provides a watertight sealed space to protect outdoor & indoor plug connections from the elements like water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt to ensure circuit safety ( Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerse it in water)
„ÄêAMPLE & AJUSTABLE COMPARTMENT„ÄëLarge housing holds both multiple connections and one on one connection; compatible with AWG 12/14/16 extension cord and flat cable; slide to adjust the position of the limiter for different lengths of connections
„ÄêFIRM AND TIGHT CONNECTION„ÄëRubber seals at both ends conform well to the power cord; 2 clamps hold the cords tightly in place; adjustable anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent the plugs from sliding or disconnecting even if tug the cords in uses
„ÄêDOUBLE LOCK & PROTECTION„Äë The top lid and 4 extra durable latches enhance the sealing of the outdoor extension cord safety seal; 4 lockable latches secure the cord safety seal box fastened for safe use even if the top lid is broken off
„ÄêEASY TO USE„Äë No tools or installation required; place the extension cord properly; slide the limiter to keep cords securely connected; lock the top lid and 4 latches for seal; hanging to save space; ideal for holiday lights, string lights, pool pumps and garden tools etc

DEWENWILS is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products. A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

4-Pack DEWENWILS Extension Cord Safety Cover

Protect You and Your Electrical Devices

Seals out water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt, keeps cords dry and together. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications like holiday decoration, string lights, water fountains, pool pumps, garden tools, and power tools, etc.

Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerge it in water.

Specifications:

Capacity: 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Dimension: 8.07 x 2.83 x2.83 Inch

Available colors: Green & Black

  • Package Includes:
  • Extension cord seal cover x 4
  • Limiter x 4
  • Hanger x 4
  • User Manual x 1

Read more

Fits 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Ample compartment holds UP TO 12 GAUGE CORDS and FLAT CABLE.

Adjust to fit multiple connections and one on one connections.

Four Lockable Latches

Lock the weatherproof cover in a tighter way with the top lid and 4 extra lockable latches. Creates a higher degree of sealing by double lock way. When the top lid is broken off, the cord safety seal cover can be locked tightly by these latches for safety uses.

Adjustable Limiter

Slide to adjust the limiter for different lengths of connection. 2 Clamps at both ends fix the cord tightly in place.

The anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent plugs from sliding or disconnecting in pulling.

ceramic heater for small space, warm you up in winter. Indicator light

The indicator light would keep lighting if the heater conduct power, which will remind you to unplug the heater when not use it.

Thermostat
The heater has thermostat that helps keep a stable temperature you set, so the heater can be warm and energy saving.

Ideal Christmas Gift
If you are looking for a gift for your parents, kids, lover, or friends, our compact space heater is a perfect choice. Bring him/her warm in cold weather just like your accompany
Easy control heater: Adjust the knob on the right to turn the unit on. “I” is for producing heat at 750 watts, “II” will produce heat faster and hotter at 1500 watts, and “Fan” will blow out cool air. Then turn the thermostat knob on the left toward the + sign. The adjustable temperature range is 0‚Ñâ to 158‚Ñâ. It will get the heater to cycle on and off according to if the room’s temperature reaching heater’s setting temperature
Energy efficient heater: With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heater to heat up 200 square feet in seconds. Helps to save electric bills by heating up needed small spaces instead of heating the whole house with other centralized heaters. It’s quiet enough to use in a bedroom while sleeping
Portable mini heater: Dimensions: 6.2 x 7 x 9.2 inch, 3.2 pounds light weight mini heater easy to carry around with handle. This 120V heater has 6 feet long cord and 2 prong connection fits for indoors use such as office, Living room, desk, home, bedroom
Safe room heater: The heater is made of flame retardant material to achieve zero fire hazard. Tip over protection shut off heater when it’s knocked over, perfect for houses have kids and pets. Overheat protection will shut heater off automatically when the heater overheat
Long serving life: Tip over swicth, overheat protection, rubber extension cord, flame retardant and ceramic speedy heating and cooling for its steady operation and a long serving life, no extra worry on accidental damage for winter life
